::Necromancer::

      Necromancer was outside of the CF, sitting on a boulder, blaming
himself for the capture of his sister.

     "Damn!  I wish I could've done something!" He shouted at himself.

      He suddenly fell off the rock backwards as he got Firearm's message.

    He got up and rubbed dirt off his body.

    "Ah, a conference," Necromancer said.

     He ran to the entrance, and went inside the CF.

     Necromancer ran into the main conference room, and took a seat.

     He looked at Spears and Firearm.

     Then he sighed and looked down.

     It reminded him of being with his sister.

     He forgot about it and lifted his head up.

    "Well, friends, what are we discussing when the others arrive?"
